EffectDesc: · On a critical hit, Physical DMG <color=#4a70b9>+10%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>30%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>15</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts Physical DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>720%</color> of ATK, with a <color=#4a70b9>1</color>s cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts additional Physical DMG.

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, Enemy Physical RES <color=#4a70b9>-30%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>15</color> (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, reduces Enemy Physical RES.

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage through a 3-Ping, Fire DMG <color=#4a70b9>+10%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>30%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>15</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage through a 3-Ping, grants Fire DMG Bonus.

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts Fire DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>720%</color> of ATK, with a <color=#4a70b9>1</color>s cooldown.

EffectDesc: · After pressing and holding Attack over <color=#4a70b9>3</color>s, Lightning DMG <color=#4a70b9>+30%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>15</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts Lightning DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>720%</color> of ATK, with a 1s cooldown.

SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, reduces Enemy Lightning RES.

EffectDesc: · When casting Signature Move, Ice DMG <color=#4a70b9>+30%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>15</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Casting Signature Move grants Ice DMG Bonus.

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts Ice DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>720%</color> of ATK, with a <color=#4a70b9>1</color>s cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts additional Ice DMG.

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, Enemy Ice RES <color=#4a70b9>-30%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>15</color> (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, reduces Enemy Ice RES.

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, Dark DMG <color=#4a70b9>+10%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>30%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>15</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, grants Dark DMG Bonus.

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts Dark DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>720%</color> of ATK, with a <color=#4a70b9>1</color>s cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts additional Dark DMG.

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, Enemy Dark RES <color=#4a70b9>-30%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>15</color> (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, reduces Enemy Dark RES.

EffectDesc: · Upon a 3-Ping, shuffles Signal Orbs, with a <color=#4a70b9>2</color>s cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon a 3-Ping, shuffles Signal Orbs, with a <color=#4a70b9>2</color>s cooldown.

EffectDesc: · For every <color=#4a70b9>1</color> Signal Orb pinged, grants Extra DMG Bonus <color=#4a70b9>+10%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>300%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Pinging Signal Orbs grants Extra DMG Bonus.

EffectDesc: · When there are less than <color=#4a70b9>8</color> Signal Orbs, replenish them to <color=#4a70b9>8</color>, with a <color=#4a70b9>12</color>s cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Automatically replenishes when low on Signal Orbs, with a <color=#4a70b9>12</color>s cooldown.

EffectDesc: · Signature Move Energy Cost <color=#4a70b9>-20%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Reduces Signature Move Energy Cost.

EffectDesc: · Whenever casting Signature Move, subsequent Signature DMG <color=#4a70b9>+40%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>200%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Casting Signature Move grants stackable Signature DMG Bonus.

EffectDesc: · When a battle starts, grants full Signature Energy.
SimpleEffectDesc: · When a battle starts, grants full Signature Energy.

EffectDesc: · When Basic Attack deals damage, inflicts <color=#4a70b9>1</color> stack of [Wound] on the enemy, with a <color=#4a70b9>0.5</color>s cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Basic Attacks inflict [Wound] on the enemy.
TraitDesc: · Upon taking Basic Attack DMG, inflicts Elemental DMG equal to the Wound stack x<color=#4a70b9>200%</color> (same element as the bearer's), with a <color=#4a70b9>4</color>s cooldown.\n· Wound can stack up to <color=#4a70b9>20</color> times for <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).

EffectDesc: · Basic Attack DMG <color=#4a70b9>+50%</color>, and each stack of [Wound] grants an additional <color=#4a70b9>4%</color> DMG Bonus (based on the highest number of stacks on an enemy).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Increases Basic Attack DMG and grants additional DMG Bonus based on the number of [Wound] stacks.
TraitDesc: · Upon taking Basic Attack DMG, inflicts Elemental DMG equal to the Wound stack x<color=#4a70b9>200%</color> (same element as the bearer's), with a <color=#4a70b9>4</color>s cooldown.\n· Wound can stack up to <color=#4a70b9>20</color> times for <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).

EffectDesc: · Every <color=#4a70b9>1</color>s, increases the next Basic Attack Final DMG by <color=#4a70b9>200%+5%</color> x[Wound] Stack (based on the highest number of stacks on an enemy).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Periodically boosts Basic Attack Final DMG based on [Wound] Stack.
TraitDesc: · Upon taking Basic Attack DMG, inflicts Elemental DMG equal to the Wound stack x<color=#4a70b9>200%</color> (same element as the bearer's), with a <color=#4a70b9>4</color>s cooldown.\n· Wound can stack up to <color=#4a70b9>20</color> times for <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).

EffectDesc: · For every <color=#4a70b9>20</color> combo hits, CRIT Rate <color=#4a70b9>+10%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>100%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Grants CRIT Rate Bonus based on combo hits.

EffectDesc: · For every <color=#4a70b9>20</color> combo hits, CRIT DMG <color=#4a70b9>+30%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>120%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>8</color>s (each stack's duration is calculated independently).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Grants CRIT DMG Bonus based on combo hits.

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts True DMG equal to Combo Count x<color=#4a70b9>1000</color> <color=#4a70b9>1</color> time, with a <color=#4a70b9>1</color>s cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Periodically inflicts True DMG based on Combo Count.

EffectDesc: · When a battle ends, [Processing Units] gained <color=#4a70b9>+40%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Grants more [Processing Units] when a battle ends.
TraitDesc: · A token used in the simulation for [Battle Reboots] or to purchase items at [Sharksco].

EffectDesc: · For every <color=#4a70b9>100</color> [Processing Units] owned, Extra DMG Bonus <color=#4a70b9>+10%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · The more [Processing Units] owned, the greater the Extra DMG Bonus.
TraitDesc: · A token used in the simulation for [Battle Reboots] or to purchase items at [Sharksco].

EffectDesc: · For every <color=#4a70b9>100</color> [Processing Units] owned, Max HP <color=#4a70b9>+3%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · The more [Processing Units] owned, the greater the Max HP Bonus.
TraitDesc: · A token used in the simulation for [Battle Reboots] or to purchase items at [Sharksco].

EffectDesc: · DMG Reduction <color=#4a70b9>+20%</color>.\n· Upon taking damage, this Bonus <color=#4a70b9>+10%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>40%</color>. This additional effect lasts <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Grants DMG Reduction Bonus and an additional stackable boost upon taking damage.

EffectDesc: · Extra DMG Bonus <color=#4a70b9>+20%</color>.\n· Upon taking damage, this Bonus <color=#4a70b9>+20%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>60%</color>. This additional effect lasts <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Grants Extra DMG Bonus and an additional stackable boost upon taking damage.

EffectDesc: · Deals Elemental DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>200%</color> of ATK to nearby enemies per second (same element as the bearer's).\n· Upon taking damage, this multiplier <color=#4a70b9>+200%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>1200%</color>. This additional effect lasts <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly).
SimpleEffectDesc: · Deals Elemental DMG to nearby enemies periodically and grants an additional stackable DMG boost upon taking damage.

EffectDesc: · Upon entering Matrix, consumes <color=#b73a3a>10%</color> of Max HP to deal Elemental DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>(consumed HP x10)%</color> of ATK to all enemies on the field (same element as the bearer's).\n· When HP is at <color=#b73a3a>1</color> or less, no longer consumes HP but still deals damage.
SimpleEffectDesc: · In Matrix, consumes HP to deal Elemental DMG to all enemies.

EffectDesc: · Upon a 3-Ping, consumes <color=#b73a3a>2%</color> of Max HP to deal Elemental DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>(consumed HP x10)%</color> of ATK to all enemies on the field (same element as the bearer's).\n· When HP is at <color=#b73a3a>1</color> or less, no longer consumes HP but still deals damage.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon a 3-Ping, consumes HP to deal Elemental DMG to all enemies.

EffectDesc: · When casting Signature Move, consumes <color=#b73a3a>30%</color> of Max HP to deal Elemental DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>(consumed HP x10)%</color> of ATK to all enemies on the field (same element as the bearer's).\n· When HP is at <color=#b73a3a>1</color> or less, no longer consumes HP but still deals damage.
SimpleEffectDesc: · When casting Signature Move, consumes HP to deal damage to all enemies.

EffectDesc: · Upon being healed, deals True DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>2800%</color> of healing received to the locked-on enemy.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon being healed, deals True DMG to the enemy.

EffectDesc: · The bearer's Healing effect <color=#4a70b9>+100%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Significantly enhances Healing effect.

EffectDesc: · Recovers <color=#4a70b9>10%</color> of max HP per second.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Recovers a small amount of HP per second.

EffectDesc: · When a battle ends, Max HP <color=#4a70b9>+300</color> (permanently stackable within one run).
SimpleEffectDesc: · When a battle ends, permanently increases Max HP in one run.

EffectDesc: · When a battle ends, ATK <color=#4a70b9>+200</color> (permanently stackable within one run).
SimpleEffectDesc: · When a battle ends, permanently increases ATK in one run.

EffectDesc: · When a battle ends, [Processing Units] gained <color=#4a70b9>+10</color> (permanently stackable within one run).
SimpleEffectDesc: · When a battle ends, the number of [Processing Units] gained permanently increases.
TraitDesc: · A token used in the simulation for [Battle Reboots] or to purchase items at [Sharksco].

EffectDesc: · Upon enemy entrance, inflicts <color=#4a70b9>10</color> stacks of [Poison].
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon enemy entrance, inflicts [Poison].
TraitDesc: · When poisoned, receives True DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>600%</color> of the bearer's ATK, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>30</color> times for <color=#4a70b9>5</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly, with each stack's DMG calculated independently).

EffectDesc: · In Matrix, creates a poisonous circle centered around the bearer, lasting <color=#4a70b9>5</color>s. All enemies within the circle gain <color=#4a70b9>1</color> stack of [Poison] per second.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Creates a poisonous circle in Matrix and periodically inflicts [Poison] on all enemies within the circle in the duration.
TraitDesc: · When poisoned, receives True DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>600%</color> of the bearer's ATK, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>30</color> times for <color=#4a70b9>5</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly, with each stack's DMG calculated independently).

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts <color=#4a70b9>1</color> stack of [Poison] on the enemy, with a <color=#4a70b9>0.5</color>s cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage, inflicts [Poison] on the enemy.
TraitDesc: · When poisoned, receives True DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>600%</color> of the bearer's ATK, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>30</color> times for <color=#4a70b9>5</color>s (refreshes when obtained repeatedly, with each stack's DMG calculated independently).

EffectDesc: · Upon dealing damage (QTE included), Enemy Extra DMG Reduction <color=#4a70b9>-50%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>8</color>s.
SimpleEffectDesc: · After dealing damage, significantly reduces the enemy's Extra DMG Reduction for a certain duration.

EffectDesc: · Upon QTE entrance, triggers Matrix and another character's QTE, with an <color=#4a70b9>8</color>s cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon QTE entrance, triggers Matrix and another character's QTE, with an <color=#4a70b9>8</color>s cooldown.

EffectDesc: · Upon healing, grants the target Extra DMG Bonus <color=#4a70b9>+60%</color> for <color=#4a70b9>8</color>s.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon healing, grants the target a significant Extra DMG Bonus for a short period.

EffectDesc: · Upon healing, grants the target <color=#4a70b9>1</color> random set of <color=#4a70b9>3</color>-Ping Orbs and <color=#4a70b9>500</color> Dodge Gauge, with a <color=#4a70b9>3</color>s cooldown.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon healing, grants the target <color=#4a70b9>3</color>-Ping Orbs and Dodge Gauge, with a <color=#4a70b9>3</color>s cooldown.

EffectDesc: · When switched into battle, grants <color=#4a70b9>100%</color> Signature Energy and clears all Signature Energy owned after <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s.
SimpleEffectDesc: · When switched into battle, grants a large amount of Signature Energy and clears it after a certain period.

EffectDesc: · When switched into battle, Extra DMG Bonus <color=#4a70b9>+100%</color> and grants <color=#4a70b9>5</color> sets of <color=#4a70b9>3</color>-Ping Orbs, lasting <color=#4a70b9>10</color>s before this effect is removed.
SimpleEffectDesc: · When switched into battle, grants a significant Extra DMG Bonus and multiple sets of Signal Orbs, removed after a certain duration.

EffectDesc: · When casting Signature Move, grants standby characters Signature Energy equal to <color=#4a70b9>50%</color> of the bearer's consumed amount.
SimpleEffectDesc: · When casting Signature Move, grants standby characters Signature Energy equal to <color=#4a70b9>50%</color> of the bearer's consumed amount.

EffectDesc: · Upon entering and leaving the field, triggers Matrix.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon entering and leaving the field, triggers Matrix.

EffectDesc: · On standby, increases ATK and HP by <color=#4a70b9>50%</color> of the bearer's stats for characters on the field.
SimpleEffectDesc: · On standby, grants ATK and HP Bonuses to characters on the field based on the bearer's stats.

EffectDesc: · On standby, transfers <color=#4a70b9>50%</color> of the damage taken by characters on the field to the bearer, disabled when the bearer's HP falls below <color=#b73a3a>20%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · On standby, transfers a portion of the damage taken on the field to the bearer.

EffectDesc: · For every <color=#4a70b9>1</color> character of a unique class in the team, all members' ATK and HP <color=#4a70b9>+30%</color>, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>60%</color>.
SimpleEffectDesc: · The more varied classes in the team, the greater the boost to all members' ATK and HP.

EffectDesc: · For every <color=#4a70b9>1</color> character of a unique class in the team, all members gain <color=#4a70b9>2</color> Signature Energy per second, stacking up to <color=#4a70b9>4</color> per second.
SimpleEffectDesc: · The more varied classes in the team, the more Signature Energy all members gain per second.

EffectDesc: · Upon entering the field (QTE included), consumes <color=#b73a3a>45%</color> of Max HP to deal Elemental DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>(consumed HP x4)%</color> of ATK to all enemies on the field (same element as the bearer's, not effective with insufficient HP).\n· On standby, recovers <color=#4a70b9>10%</color> of Max HP per second.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon entering the field (QTE included), consumes HP to deal Elemental DMG to all enemies on the field.\n· On standby, recovers HP over time.

EffectDesc: · Upon entering the field (QTE included), consumes <color=#b73a3a>45%</color> of Max HP to deal Elemental DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>(consumed HP x4)%</color> of ATK to all enemies on the field (same element as the bearer's, not effective with insufficient HP).\n· On standby, recovers <color=#4a70b9>10%</color> of Max HP per second.
SimpleEffectDesc: · Upon entering the field (QTE included), consumes HP to deal Elemental DMG to all enemies on the field.\n· On standby, recovers HP over time.

EffectDesc: · On standby, for every <color=#b73a3a>7</color> Signal Orbs pinged on the field, grants <color=#4a70b9>1</color> Missile Support that deals Elemental DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>777%</color> of the bearer's ATK (same element as the bearer's).
SimpleEffectDesc: · On standby, grants Missile Support upon a certain number of orbs pinged on the field.

EffectDesc: · On standby, for every <color=#b73a3a>70</color> Signature Energy consumed on the field, grants <color=#4a70b9>1</color> Missile Support that deals Elemental DMG equal to <color=#4a70b9>777%</color> of the bearer's ATK (same element as the bearer's).
SimpleEffectDesc: · On standby, grants Missile Support upon a certain amount of Signature Energy consumed on the field.
